sentences.en: Even mental phenomena are assumed to be ultimately explicable in terms of the physical brain.
sentences.cn: 甚至对于精神现象,人们也做出假定说,它们最终可以根据物质性的大脑得到解释.

sentences.en: His behaviour is explicable in the light of his recent illness.
sentences.cn: 他因近日患病,这种表现是可以理解的.

sentences.en: Scientists had maintained that the crop failure was not explicable.
sentences.cn: 科学家认为作物歉收原因不明.

sentences.en: The delay is partly explicable by the road works.
sentences.cn: 延误的部份原因是道路施工.

sentences.en: The older I grow, the stranger and less explicable the world appears to me.
sentences.cn: 年龄越大，世界对我而言就变得越陌生、越难理解。

sentences.en: The pattern of formation of unit HEs is explicable by the following example.
sentences.cn: 格局的形成单位统计调查的解释由下面的例子.

sentences.en: The success of the Revolution is explicable in terms of the weakness of the king’s government.
sentences.cn: 革命的成功可归因于国王政府的软弱。

sentences.en: The sudden increase in sales is easily explicable.
sentences.cn: 销售额的突然增加是很容易理解的.

sentences.en: This generalized definition includes traditional definition of contour and is explicable the law of cartographic generalization.
sentences.cn: 本定义包容了传统的等高线定义并可解释制图综合规律.

words.tran_cn: 在待解释的术语或陈述
说明；阐明；展开（花瓣、叶子等的）

trans.tran_en: able to be easily understood or explained
